name: Hype and Vice
headline: Fashionable college branded apparel for women.
generated_description:
Hype and Vice is an innovative company founded in 2016, operating out of Los Angeles, CA, and proudly part of Y Combinator's S19 batch. The mission? To create stylish, college-branded apparel specifically designed for women. Think of them as your go-to for fashionable sportswear, whether you're hitting the books or cheering from the stands.

With a nimble team of 30 employees, they focus on a niche that's all too often overlooked: offering sports fans stylish alternatives to traditional jerseys and uniforms. Their offerings span various leagues, including NCAA, NBA, and MLS, helping women express their team spirit without sacrificing style.

Their product lineup features an array of apparel, from cozy hoodies to trendy tank tops, and includes unique pieces that allow fans to flaunt their affiliations in a chic yet comfortable manner. Everything is made to order, which not only reduces waste but also provides customers with bespoke options tailored to their personal taste.

As you're browsing their online store at [hypeandvice.com](http://hypeandvice.com), you'll find well-curated collections for every occasion: whether you're lounging at home or ready to hit the tailgate scene. They have you covered with everything from bestsellers to new arrivals, sales to specialty items like Greek custom orders.

In an industry often dominated by one-size-fits-all designs, Hype and Vice is changing the game. They encourage women to assert their sports fandom with confidence and style, reminding us that being a passionate supporter of a team can also align with high fashion. So, if you’re looking to elevate your game day outfit—without compromising on what it means to look good doing it—Hype and Vice is where your search should begin.
